title: just respectable
review: After 40 years i went to Cinemark Colombia to watch this film, very respectable production directed by Francis Ford Coppola, what a performance of Marlon Brando and Martin Sheen, the plot and the dialogues are so strong, very good movie, classics like this one will live forever

title: good enough
review: I really like this movie, I found a good plot and also a good final, yeah the people cry and more, but it is a serious movie with several elements which honored to its fans, It is indeed a super hero movie that will live in th mind of many fans
